task.summary: Adding images and Image project to the Repository
Annotating the test file for threaded window with comments, refactoring method names to make sense and abstracting methods to show object orientation.
Arranging in MVC pattern and renaming objects to make sense with design pattern
Standardizing import names and making variable names reusable for copy-paste modification.
Making view generic with a passed-in window to reside.
Removing redundant, or unneeded code, except that which is needed for presentation
Wired up the launcher, fixed custom imports. Currently launches but will not run. Will add logging for debuggin later.

Made the UI work in an MVC pattern with some adjustments and following some examples on StackOverflow. Not using threading, but instead using the mainloop of Tkinter to do the updates. This is working under Python 3.4, will port to Python 2.7 and recommit, but not before splitting this branch into a 3.4 working version.
Modified imports for Python 2.7 and added 'TimeSince' for update function. Will use these to determine decay rates later on.
This version is setup for Python 3.4
Cut out un-needed example code. Will recreate sample code following new design.
Added iamge to the frame, got the image sizes right, and fixed the layout of the frame to look better
Committing smaller images left out in last commit
